ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer - Beast & Animal Gear
ModMetaData.author: SickBoyWi
ModMetaData.description:
This mod makes use of the Animal Gear and the Rimhammer - The End Times mods series./n/nThe purpose of this mod is to add themed animal apparel to accompany the Rimhammer - The End Times mods.
Rimhammer - The End Times - Empire: This mod currently adds two types of horse gear to the game themed to the Empire of Man from the Warhammer world: Horse Plate Armor (as used by the Knightly Orders), and Horse Leather Saddle and Tack as used by Outriders and Pisoleers.
The horse that these armors work with is the Empire War Horse that is added by the Rimhammer Empire mod.
